SEARCH
Module RobotGUI
Package application

Class AdvancedRobot

java.lang.Object
application.Robot
application.BasicRobot
application.AdvancedRobot
public class AdvancedRobot extends BasicRobot
Represents an advanced robot that inherits from BasicRobot. This robot has enhanced movement capabilities and displays wheels based on its movement.

      public void drawRobot(MyCanvas mc)
      Draws the robot on the canvas, including its main body and wheels.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      mc - The MyCanvas object used to draw the robot.

    • move

      public void move(double xLimit, double yLimit)
      Moves the robot based on the movement of its left and right wheels. If the robot detects an obstacle, it will turn to avoid it.
      Overrides:
      move in class BasicRobot
      Parameters:
      xLimit - The maximum x-coordinate boundary.
      yLimit - The maximum y-coordinate boundary.

    • select

      public void select()
      Selects the robot, allowing for movement and deletion.

    • deselect

      public void deselect()
      Deselects the robot.

    • isSelected

      public boolean isSelected()
      Checks if the robot is selected.
      Returns:
      true if the robot is selected, false otherwise.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double newX, double newY)
      Moves the robot to a specified position if it is selected.
      Parameters:
      newX - The new x-coordinate.
      newY - The new y-coordinate.

    • deleteRobot

      public void deleteRobot(List<AdvancedRobot> robotList)

      Parameters:

    • sensorSeesObstacle

      public boolean sensorSeesObstacle(double xLimit, double yLimit)
      Helper method to check if the robot is about to bump into something (simple bump sensors).
      Parameters:
      xLimit - The maximum x-coordinate boundary.
      yLimit - The maximum y-coordinate boundary.
      Returns:
      true if the robot detects a collision, false otherwise.
